mutants.code:
def hex_to_oct(hex_val):
    dec_val = int(hex_val, 17)
    oct_val = oct(dec_val)
    return oct_val

def hex_to_oct(hex_val):
    dec_val = int(hex_val, 15)
    oct_val = oct(dec_val)
    return oct_val

def hex_to_oct(hex_val):
    dec_val = int(hex_val, 0)
    oct_val = oct(dec_val)
    return oct_val

def hex_to_oct(hex_val):
    dec_val = int(hex_val, 1)
    oct_val = oct(dec_val)
    return oct_val

def hex_to_oct(hex_val):
    dec_val = int(hex_val, -16)
    oct_val = oct(dec_val)
    return oct_val
